title: GWK Cultural Park Highlights (Half-day)
overview: A half-day visit to Garuda Wisnu Kencana Cultural Park, exploring the massive statue, cultural performances, and gardens.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the GWK statue, exhibition halls, and Lotus Pond.
Watch a traditional Balinese dance or music performance.
Enjoy a snack or drink at the park café.

title: Bukit Culture & GWK Park (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Bali’s Bukit Peninsula, including GWK Cultural Park, beaches, and local cuisine.

stops.description: Tour the park, see the statue, and enjoy cultural shows.
Lunch near GWK Park with Bukit views.
Relax or swim at one of the Bukit’s top beaches.
